languages.text: {n}Смех космодесантника Хаоса похож на раскаты далекого грома.{/n} "Слова несчастно{mf|го|й}, блуждающе{mf|го|й} во тьме неведения. Мы — первые среди братьев, кто сумел распознать великий обман и проложить путь к божественности. Наш примарх совершил паломничество к Истине — сей путь по-прежнему открыт для зрячих. Твои обвинения — слова слеп{mf|ого|ой}, очарованн{mf|ого|ой} древней ложью".

traits.locale_text: {n}Смех Хаос-десантника похож на раскаты далекого грома.{/n} "Слова несчастно{mf|го|й}, блуждающе{mf|го|й} во тьме неведения. Мы — первые среди братьев, сбросившие иго ложного бога. Мы — те, кто проложил путь для остальных зрячих. Мы — те, кто сметет ваше царство, не оставив от ложной веры и следа".

languages.text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine's laughter is akin to the roll of distant thunder.{/n} "Words of a wretch who wanders through the darkness of ignorance. We were the first among our brothers to discern the great lie and forge the path to divinity. Our Primarch went on a pilgrimage to find the Truth — a path that is still open to the sighted. Your accusations are the words of a blind servant in thrall to an ancient lie."
languages.original_text: {n}Смех космодесантника Хаоса похож на раскаты далекого грома.{/n} "Слова несчастно{mf|го|й}, блуждающе{mf|го|й} во тьме неведения. Мы — первые среди братьев, кто сумел распознать великий обман и проложить путь к божественности. Наш примарх совершил паломничество к Истине — сей путь по-прежнему открыт для зрячих. Твои обвинения — слова слеп{mf|ого|ой}, очарованн{mf|ого|ой} древней ложью".

We were the first among our brothers to discern the great lie and forge the path to divinity. Our Primarch took the Pilgrimage to the Truth — and this path is still open to the sighted. Your accusations are the words of a blind servant enthralled by an ancient lie."

languages.text: {n}La risa del Marine Espacial del Caos te recuerda a un trueno lejano.{/n} «Las palabras de un despojo que se debate en la oscuridad de la ignorancia. Fuimos los primeros de nuestros hermanos en descubrir la gran mentira y labrarnos el camino a la divinidad. Nuestro Primarca emprendió un peregrinaje en busca de la Verdad, un viaje que sigue abierto a cuantos tienen ojos. Tus acusaciones son las palabras de un{mf||a} sirvient{mf|e|a} cieg{mf|o|a}, esclav{mf|o|a} de una mentira ancestral».
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine's laughter is akin to the roll of distant thunder.{/n} "Words of a wretch who wanders through the darkness of ignorance. We were the first among our brothers to discern the great lie and forge the path to divinity. Our Primarch went on a pilgrimage to find the Truth — a path that is still open to the sighted. Your accusations are the words of a blind servant in thrall to an ancient lie."

Tus acusaciones son las palabras de un{mf||a} sirvient{mf|e|a} cieg{mf|o|a}, esclav{mf|o|a} de una mentira ancestral».

languages.text: {n}ケイオス・スペースマリーンの笑い声は遠くで轟く稲妻の音に似ている。{/n}「無知の闇をさまよう哀れな者の言葉だ。我らは同胞の中で最初に大いなる嘘を見抜き、神性への道を切り開いた。総主長は真実を探す巡礼の旅に出た―目が開かれた者であれば、誰でもまだその道を歩むことができる。お前の非難は、古代の嘘に支配された盲目の下僕の言葉にすぎん」
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine's laughter is akin to the roll of distant thunder.{/n} "Words of a wretch who wanders through the darkness of ignorance. We were the first among our brothers to discern the great lie and forge the path to divinity. Our Primarch went on a pilgrimage to find the Truth — a path that is still open to the sighted. Your accusations are the words of a blind servant in thrall to an ancient lie."

traits.locale_text: {n}ケイオス・スペースマリーンの笑い声は遠くで轟く稲妻の音に似ている。{/n}「無知の闇をさまよう哀れな者の言葉だ。我らは同胞の中で最初に大いなる嘘を見抜き、神性への道を切り開いた。総主長は真実を探す巡礼の旅に出た―目が開かれた者であれば、誰でもまだその道を歩むことができる。お前の非難は、古代の嘘に支配された盲目の下僕の言葉にすぎん」

languages.text: {n}混沌星际战士大笑起来，仿佛远方的滚滚雷鸣。{/n}“如此大放厥词，可你不过是条可怜虫，徘徊在无知的黑暗之中。在我们的众多兄弟中，是我们最先识破那个了弥天大谎，开辟了通往神性的道路。我们的基因原体踏上了寻找真理的朝圣之旅，所有明眼之人，都可以踏上这条道路。至于你这些指控，不过是个瞎了眼的仆人受到古老谎言的蛊惑，在盲目叫嚣罢了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine's laughter is akin to the roll of distant thunder.{/n} "Words of a wretch who wanders through the darkness of ignorance. We were the first among our brothers to discern the great lie and forge the path to divinity. Our Primarch went on a pilgrimage to find the Truth — a path that is still open to the sighted. Your accusations are the words of a blind servant in thrall to an ancient lie."

traits.locale_text: {n}混沌星际战士大笑起来，仿佛远方的滚滚雷鸣。{/n}“如此大放厥词，可你不过是条可怜虫，徘徊在无知的黑暗之中。在我们的众多兄弟中，是我们最先识破那个了弥天大谎，开辟了通往神性的道路。我们的基因原体踏上了寻找真理的朝圣之旅，所有明眼之人，都可以踏上这条道路。至于你这些指控，不过是个瞎了眼的仆人受到古老谎言的蛊惑，在盲目叫嚣罢了。”

languages.text: {n}Le Space Marine du Chaos éclate d'un rire tonitruant qui se mêle au grondement du tonnerre lointain.{/n} « Voilà les paroles d'une misérable vermine égarée dans les ténèbres de l'ignorance. Nous avons été les premiers parmi nos frères à découvrir la grande imposture, c'est nous qui avons forgé la voie vers le divin, celle que notre Primarque a tracée lors de son pèlerinage pour la Vérité, un chemin qui reste ouvert aux clairvoyants. Vos accusations témoignent de l'aveuglement {mf|d'un esclave asservi|d'une esclave asservie} à un mensonge ancestral. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine's laughter is akin to the roll of distant thunder.{/n} "Words of a wretch who wanders through the darkness of ignorance. We were the first among our brothers to discern the great lie and forge the path to divinity. Our Primarch went on a pilgrimage to find the Truth — a path that is still open to the sighted. Your accusations are the words of a blind servant in thrall to an ancient lie."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Space Marine du Chaos éclate d'un rire tonitruant qui se mêle au grondement du tonnerre lointain.{/n} « Voilà les paroles d'une misérable vermine égarée dans les ténèbres de l'ignorance. Nous avons été les premiers parmi nos frères à découvrir la grande imposture, c'est nous qui avons forgé la voie vers le divin, celle que notre Primarque a tracée lors de son pèlerinage pour la Vérité, un chemin qui reste ouvert aux clairvoyants. Vos accusations témoignent de l'aveuglement {mf|d'un esclave asservi|d'une esclave asservie} à un mensonge ancestral. »

languages.text: {n}Das Lachen des Chaos Space Marine gleicht dem Grollen fernen Donners.{/n} "Worte eines Wurms, der durch die Dunkelheit der Unwissenheit wandert. Wir haben als Erste unter uns Brüdern die große Lüge erkannt und den Pfad zur Göttlichkeit beschritten. Unser Primarch ist zu einer Pilgerreise aufgebrochen, um die Wahrheit zu finden — und dieser Pfad steht den Sehenden noch immer offen. Eure Vorwürfe sind die Worte eines blinden Dieners, der Sklave einer uralten Lüge ist."
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine's laughter is akin to the roll of distant thunder.{/n} "Words of a wretch who wanders through the darkness of ignorance. We were the first among our brothers to discern the great lie and forge the path to divinity. Our Primarch went on a pilgrimage to find the Truth — a path that is still open to the sighted. Your accusations are the words of a blind servant in thrall to an ancient lie."

Eure Vorwürfe sind die Worte eines blinden Dieners, der Sklave einer uralten Lüge ist."

languages.text: {n}Kaosçu Uzay Piyadesi'nin kahkahası, bir gök gürültüsünün uzak sesini andırıyor.{/n} "Cehaletin pençesinde mahsur kalmış bir adinin sözleri. Kardeşlerimiz arasında bu büyük yalanı ilk gören, azamete giden yolu ilk inşa edenlerdendik biz. Primarkımız, Hakikat'i bulmak için bir yolculuğa çıktı. Bu yol, görebilenlere hâlâ açıktır. Senin ithamların; kadim bir yalana köle olmuş, kör bir hizmetkârın boş sözlerinden öte değildir."
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine's laughter is akin to the roll of distant thunder.{/n} "Words of a wretch who wanders through the darkness of ignorance. We were the first among our brothers to discern the great lie and forge the path to divinity. Our Primarch went on a pilgrimage to find the Truth — a path that is still open to the sighted. Your accusations are the words of a blind servant in thrall to an ancient lie."

Kardeşlerimiz arasında bu büyük yalanı ilk gören, azamete giden yolu ilk inşa edenlerdendik biz. Primark’ımız, Hakikat’i bulmak için bir yolculuğa çıktı. Bu yol, görebilenlere hâlâ açıktır. Senin ithamların; kadim bir yalana köle olmuş, kör bir hizmetkârın boş sözlerinden öte değildir.”
